import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { User } from 'src/app/features/auth/models/user.model'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/features/auth/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'], }) export class NavbarComponent implements OnInit { user?: User; constructor(private authService: AuthService, private router: Router) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.authService.user().subscribe({ next: (res) => { this.user = res; }, }); this.user = this.authService.getUser(); } onLogout(): void { this.authService.logout(); this.router.navigateByUrl('/'); } }
